Vulnerability.Title: Your web application's trust level is higher than Minimal
Vulnerability.Description:
Your ASP.NET web application is working with full privileges. If it 's compromised by an attacker, then the attacker gains full control of your web server. It is a general security principle to run all applications with least privileges.

Secure Configuration

<configuration>
   <system.web>
      <trust level="Minimal">

References

  • http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/tkscy493.aspx
  • http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/wyts434y.aspx
